text: Ordered 2 packets of Si chap hor fun which cannot be found on the menu. Had to pay an extra $2.40. The taste of their hor fun is nowhere near what I eat from other places. Will not purchase from them again.

The cashier was really rude yesterday (12/01/25). I ordered my food to go, and it was clearly ready. I politely asked if it was mine, and she told me to wait. She then went on to serve three other people in line, turned her back, and finally grabbed my food to hand it to me. Was it really that difficult to just give me my food first since it was already done and sitting there? The wait was completely unnecessary.
The attitude of short hair female woman cashier is so bad that I had stopped ordering from this seafood stall since the last 2 months. Her working attitude is not fit for F&B sector.
Bad attitude from cashier with the short hair, just throw buzzer to customer very rude also. The food also take so long to do. I just ordered fried rice and silky egg hor fun.
Super duper slow service. So if you want to eat at around 5-9pm . Let say u want to have it at 8pm , better order at 7ish. Cos they are damn freaking slow.
